law_name: THE CIVIL SERVANTS (VALIDATION OF RULES) ORDINANCE

sections.body: (1) This Ordinance may be called the Civil Servants (Validation of Rules) Ordinance, 2001. (2) It shall come into force at once.

(1) The Civil Servants Occupational Group and Services (Probation, Training and Seniority) Rules, 1990, the Civil Servants (Seniority) Rules, 1993 and the Civil Servants (Confirmation) Rules, 1993 and all notification amending the aforesaid Rules immediately before the commencement of this Ordinance are hereby affirmed and shall be deemed always to have been validly made. (2) All orders made, proceedings taken, acts done, instructions issued, powers exercised, appointments made thereunder by any authority which were made, taken, done, issued, or exercised immediately before the commencement of this Ordinance shall be deemed to have been validly made, taken, done, issued or exercised and deemed always to have had effect accordingly.
